alert.note: Alert for Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 4:38PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lake County through 515 PM EDT... At 437 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Louisa, or 10 miles west of Bay Lake. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clermont, Lake Louisa and Minneola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
